onBoarding.btcBackedAssetSubTitle: RGB protocol allows anyone to issue, send, or receive assets on the most secure blockchain, using sats from your wallet as fuel for these assets.
onBoarding.btcBackedAssetInfo: Sats from your wallet will be used as fuel for these assets.
onBoarding.rememberPasscodeSubTitle: Please remember your passcode and backup your app by writing down the 12-word recovery key
onBoarding.rememberPasscodeDesc: You would be locked out of the app if you forget your passcode and will have to recover it.
onBoarding.authSubTitle: To proceed, please authenticate yourself and ensure the.
onBoarding.supportTermAndConditionTitle: By checking this box, you agree to the terms and conditions.
onBoarding.termAndConditionBrief: Bitcoin Tribe provides an option to connect external nodes; however, support for this feature is managed by an external service provider. Please review the following terms:
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle1: Bitcoin Tribe offers a feature to connect external nodes but does not provide support or assume responsibility for the connection process or related issues.
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle2: For assistance with setup or troubleshooting, please contact the external provider directly, as they manage all support for external node connectivity.
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle3: Bitcoin Tribe is not liable for any data loss, misconfigurations, or other consequences resulting from connecting to an external node. Use this option at your discretion.
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle4: Bitcoin Tribe may update this feature without notice. Any changes to support availability or terms should be confirmed with the external provider.
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle5: These terms are governed by the applicable jurisdiction‚Äôs laws
onBoarding.useRGBAssetSubTitle: These assets are on the testnet/regnet, have no real value, and can be reset anytime. For play only.
onBoarding.nodeConnectingSubTitle: Connecting to your node. Keep the app open and screen unlocked.
onBoarding.supportNodeConnectingSubTitle: Connecting to your node. Keep the app open and screen unlocked.
onBoarding.nodeconnectSuccessfulSubTitle: You‚Äôre now connected. Proceed to the next step.
onBoarding.profileSetupLoadingSubTitle: Sit back and relax as we get everything ready for you. Your app will be ready in just a moment.
onBoarding.recoverLoadingSubTitle: Please hold on for a moment while we complete the recovery process. Avoid closing the app to ensure everything runs smoothly. Thank you for your patience!
onBoarding.onchainLearMoreInfo: A secure wallet for all your Bitcoin transactions.
onBoarding.lightningLearnMoreInfo: Fast and low-cost transactions for small amounts.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreInfo: A wallet compatible with other Bitcoin applications.
onBoarding.onChainLearnMoreSubTitle: An on-chain wallet ensures full control of your bitcoin by storing it securely on the bitcoin blockchain.
onBoarding.onchainLearnMoreContent1: You own your private keys for ultimate security.
onBoarding.onchainLearnMoreContent2: Transactions are fully recorded on the blockchain.
onBoarding.onchainLearnMoreContent3: Long-term storage and secure large transactions.
onBoarding.onchainLearnMoreContent4: Take full control of your bitcoin with self-custody on-chain.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreSubtitle: A Lightning Wallet offers fast and cost-effective Bitcoin transactions while maintaining full control over your funds.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreContent1: Enter the API URL of the node you want to connect with.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreContent2: Use this if your node asks for a username and password.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreContent3: Use this if your node provides a token. Paste the full token exactly as provided.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreContent4: Enjoy the speed and efficiency of Bitcoin with self-custody on the Lightning Network.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreSubtitle: A Supported Wallet provides a balance of convenience and security by leveraging relay services for asset management.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreContent1: Custody is managed with the help of a trusted relay, simplifying wallet management.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreContent2: Ideal for users who prefer a straightforward setup and minimal complexity.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreContent3: Relay-based backups ensure asset recovery and secure management.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreContent4: Enjoy a user-friendly experience with enhanced security in Supported Mode.
onBoarding.backupFileNotFound: We couldn‚Äôt find your RGB Asset file. Please upload the file from your phone.

home.addAssetSubTitle: Choose how you want to create or receive your asset.
home.noAssetSubTitle: Tap the plus icon below to issue your first asset.
home.noCollectibleAssetSubTitle: Ready to create your masterpiece? Tap the "+" icon below to issue your first RGB Asset and start managing your digital assets today. Create, manage, and send assets seamlessly.
home.noCoinAssetSubTitle: Ready to create your masterpiece? Tap the "+" icon below to issue your first RGB coin and start managing your digital assets today. Create, manage, and send coins seamlessly.
home.backupAlertTitle:
Secure your funds 
with a backup
home.backupAlertSubTitle: Backing up your wallet ensures that your funds are safe, even if you lose your device. Take a moment to create a backup now.
home.pullDownInfo2: All balances and transaction statuses in Bitcoin Tribe¬†update automatically¬†in the background. You only need to¬†pull down to refresh¬†for a¬†forced update¬†if needed.
home.pullDownInfo4: To quickly see the latest updates after making a transaction.
home.pullDownInfo5: To ensure your app reflects the most recent data instantly.

settings.assetBackupInfo1: Asset backup is optional since we perform backups on the relay.

settings.backupPhraseSubTitle: Carefully write down the 12-word Backup Phrase in a private place and ensure its security
settings.backupPhraseSubTitle1: Anyone with access to the Backup Phrase can access and withdraw your funds. Losing it means you can‚Äôt recover your wallet.
settings.utxoInfoSubTitle1: UTXOs (Unspent Transaction Outputs)¬†are like digital coins in your Bitcoin wallet. When you make a transaction, it creates outputs, and the ones you haven‚Äôt used yet are called UTXOs.
settings.utxoInfoSubTitle3: Blue border is removed, and UTXOs appear in a colorable list.
settings.bioUnlockTitle: Set Passcode to Enable Biometric Login
settings.bioUnlockSubTitle: To use biometric authentication in Bitcoin Tribe, you need to set a device passcode first. This keeps your wallet and assets secure.

resetWalletMessages.Aresure: Are you sure you want to reset?
resetWalletMessages.clearCurrentWalletSetup: This action will clear your current wallet setup.
resetWalletMessages.clearCurrentWalletState: This action will clear your current wallet state. Your BTC balance will remain the same, only added assets will be removed.
resetWalletMessages.pleaseTypeReset: Please type RESET below to confirm.
resetWalletMessages.rgbWalletCorrupted: RGB wallet data looks corrupted. Reset may be required to continue.
resetWalletMessages.clearRgbAssetData: ‚Ä¢ Resetting will clear your RGB assets.
resetWalletMessages.btcBalanceNotAffected: ‚Ä¢ Your Bitcoin (BTC) balance is not affected.
resetWalletMessages.rgbAssetsNoLongerAccessible: If you reset, any RGB assets linked to this wallet will no longer be accessible.
resetWalletMessages.proceedWithReset: Do you want to proceed with resetting your RGB wallet?
resetWalletMessages.pleaseWaitReset: Please wait while we reset your wallet and set things up for a fresh start.
resetWalletMessages.fewSecondsStep: This step will take a few seconds.
resetWalletMessages.YouMustBackup: You must back up your wallet before resetting to avoid losing access to your assets.
resetWalletMessages.YourWalletWill: Your wallet will now perform a full resync.
resetWalletMessages.ThisMayTake: This may take a few minutes depending on your data size and network speed.
resetWalletMessages.PleaseDoNot: Please do not minimize or close the app until the process is complete.
